name: POP4 Number Puzzle Game
description:
POP4 is a fun and addictive number puzzle game.

Pop numbers to create chain reactions and clear levels.
How many levels can you clear?

HOW TO PLAY:
- Touch numbers to increase them by one.
- Touched four pops.
- Every pop increases neighbour numbers by one.
- Create chain reactions to gain more moves.
- Have fun! :)

No in-app purchases, no hidden costs!

FEATURES:
- Simple gameplay
- Endless puzzles for you to enjoy!
- Relaxing!
- Great looking
- Fun
- Addictive!
- Global high scores with Game Center!
- Share your scores to your facebook friends!

Watch out - it's impossible to stop playing!
